name: concept_completion_question
description: A question presented to prompt the addressee to supply the absent component of a phenomenon to form a coherent concept or idea.

name: procedural_question
description: A question seeking what instrument or plan allows to accomplish a goal.

name: causal_antecedent_question
description: A question seeking what state or event causally led to an event or state.

name: causal_consequence_question
description: A question seeking to explore the consequences of an event or state.

name: justification_question
description: A question seeking to explore the reasons or rationale behind the situation or condition represented by an entity.
